title: Selune's Spear of Night
content: Selune's Spear of Night Legendary 4~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+3 Piercing Selune's Blessing: You gain Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws and Perception Checks. Darkvision: You can see in the dark up to 12m.
